artist: Artist: Ōta Masamitsu; Carver: Itō Susumu; Printer: Itō Harutarō
inscription:
on the attached paper:
Review of the print by Wakiya Mitsunobu
Carver:Ito_ Susumu
Printer:Ito_ Shuntaro_
Producer:Miyake Yo_zo_
medium: Woodblock print; ink and color on paper with gofun
portfolio: From Figures on the Stage in the Shōwa Period (Shōwa butai sugata 昭和舞台姿)
text: Actor Onoe Kikugorō VI (1885-1949) as Yayoi in the play "The Lion Dance" (Kagamijishi 鏡獅子). In the cause of this famous and demanding dance for the performer, the shy maiden transformes into the spirit of a fierce lion.
title: No. 1, Actor Onoe Kikugorō VI in the play "Kagamijishi"
